title: The Inner Carnivore
description: Your pet does not have to be a victim of unhealthy processed foods. Join the thousands of people who are successfully feeding their pets a species appropriate diet and enjoying their healthy companions. The Inner Carnivore is a priceless resource for leading your animal companions to a healthier lifestyle through feeding a natural diet. If you are concerned about harmful processed foods and want to educate yourself about natural diets this is the book for you. Readers will be guided through the multitude of health problems created by processed foods. Learn how an animalâ€™s anatomy, physiology and natural habits clearly illuminate what an appropriate diet consists of and how to provide such a diet.
author: Jennifer     Lee
